name: Wrathmalos (Early Access Demo)
description:
She was shipwrecked during a relaxing boat trip with her husband. There’s monsters prowling the island. There’s something supposedly in the air. The locals are hiding something. Her husband is hiding something. The mysterious drone assisting them seems to know more than he’s willing to let on. Her bracelet is the only thing that can stop the oncoming horde.

Welcome to Wrathmalos. Enjoy your stay.

(Wrathmalos is a big project that I’m working on, and this way-too-early-access demo was made as part of Devtober 2020. It covers the intro of the game, because I’d already written that part up and figured “what the heck, why not make something out of what I have already?” Everything you see in this demo is still a work-in-progress, and I’m happy to hear any advice or criticisms you may have!)

(Included is the project's post-mortem, for all to read and enjoy if they so wish.)

(Full game releasing I have absolutely no idea when.)
